snippet: The police used pepper spray against as many as 30 demonstrators as students angry over a plan by Santa Monica College to offer high-priced courses tried to push their way into a trustees meeting.
abstract: Police use pepper spray on Santa Monica College students protesting tuition plan that would raise price of core courses to $600, about four times the current price.
lead_paragraph: The police used pepper spray against as many as 30 demonstrators as students angry over a plan by Santa Monica College to offer high-priced courses tried to push their way into a trustees meeting.

headline.main: California: Police Use Pepper Spray on Students Protesting Tuition Plan
headline.print_headline: California: Police Use Pepper Spray On Students Protesting Tuition Plan
